warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Extend your arms out to the sides and make small circles, gradually increasing the size. Perform 2 sets of 30 seconds each direction.

warmup_exercises.setup_notes: Get on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Alternate between arching your back (cat) and dipping it (cow) while breathing deeply. Perform 2 sets of 10 reps.
Swing your arms forward and backward in a controlled manner. Perform 2 sets of 30 seconds.

exercises.setup: Sit down at a lat pull-down machine and adjust the knee pad to fit snugly against your thighs.
execution: 1. Grip the bar with a wide grip, palms facing forward.
2. Sit down with your back straight and feet flat on the floor.
3. Pull the bar down towards your upper chest, keeping your elbows pointed down and back.
4. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom of the movement.
5. Slowly return the bar to the starting position, maintaining control.
exercises.weight: Select a weight where the last 2-3 reps feel challenging but still allow you to maintain proper form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at the lat pull-down machine with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Pull the bar down towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
2. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom.
3. Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Choose a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on engaging your lats and avoid using momentum to pull the bar down.

exercises.setup: Use a chest-supported row machine or incline bench.
execution: 1. Lie face down on the bench with your chest supported.
2. Grip the handles or dumbbells with your arms extended.
3. Pull the weight towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
4. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top of the movement.
5. Slowly lower the weight back to the starting position.
exercises.weight: Use a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at a cable row machine with your feet on the platform and knees slightly bent.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Grip the handle with both hands and sit upright.
2. Pull the handle towards your abdomen, keeping your elbows close to your body.
3. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
4. Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Keep your chest against the pad to prevent using your lower back to lift the weight.

exercises.setup: Use a preacher bench to angle your upper arm.
execution: 1. Sit on the preacher bench and place your upper arms on the pad.
2. Grip the bar with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
3. Curl the bar towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms stationary.
4. Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement.
5. Slowly lower the bar back to the starting position, maintaining tension.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows you to complete 10-12 reps with good form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at the preacher curl machine with your upper arms resting on the pad.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Grip the handles with an underhand grip.
2. Curl the handles towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms stationary.
3. Squeeze your biceps at the top.
4. Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with proper form.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on a slow and controlled movement to maximize tension on the biceps.
